Text:
I am downloading, and will watch ASAP.
HOWEVER, being as it's a folder in my Season folder, in a couple days, I WILL be moving the file, which will render my unable to seed.
[IF the uploaders would STOP putting extra files (which causes them to create a folder where I select the download to...) than I'd be glad to leave the files available to everyone for longer.]

@ONT_Man: I agree it's a pain having the xtra upload info. The way I get round it is to copy the dload onto a 1tb portable drive (my library!) and then edit the files in there, leaving the dload intact on my PC for seeding.
